product_name: Novara Padded Bike Boy Short Underwear - Women's
long_description: The versatile Novara padded bike boy short underwear can easily be worn under a skirt, shorts or pants to add comfort to your ride, whether casually cruising through town or adventuring all day. The boy short underwear design uses a thin polyester/spandex blend to offer comfort and moisture-wicking performance; lace waistband. Thin triathlon-inspired chamois features a high-density foam that conforms to body contours and moves with you for on- and off-bike comfort. The Novara padded bike boy shorts have a comfortable, body-hugging fit and are meant to be worn under clothing.
